repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Pan American World Airways-Air Line Pilots Association Mediation Records
did.abstract: Materials pertaining to contract negotiations between Pan American World Airways and pilots and flight engineers, including salary and other data. Pertains to PanAm, Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA), and the Flight Engineers international Association, 1960.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials pertaining to contract negotiations between Pan American World Airways and pilots and flight engineers, including salary and other data. Pertains to PanAm, Air Line Pilots Association (ALPA), and the Flight Engineers international Association, 1960.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pan American World Airways-Air Line Pilots Association Mediation Records #5354. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Materials pertaining to contract negotiations re: pilots and flight engineers, including salary and other data. Pertains to PanAm, ALPA, and the Flight Engineers international Association, 1960..

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Mr. Robert H. Metchick, System Industrial Relations
